headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.gstatic.com https://www.google.com https://www.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.googleapis.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';
